Layout

Grid


[row]
  [column sm="6"] ... [/column]
  [column sm="6"] ... [/column]
[/row]

Flexbox columns are supported by using "flex" rather than a column width.


[row]
  [column xs="flex"] ... [/column]
  [column xs="flex"] ... [/column]
[/row]

The container component is also supported in case your theme doesn't include a container.


[container]
  [row]
    [column xs="flex"] ... [/column]
    [column xs="flex"] ... [/column]
  [/row]
[/container]

The container-fluid component is supported as a discrete shortcode.


[container-fluid]  
[row]
    [column xs="flex"] ... [/column]
    [column xs="flex"] ... [/column]
  [/row]
[/container-fluid]

[container] parameters

Parameter Description Required Values Default
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

[row] parameters

Parameter Description Required Values Default
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

[column] parameters

Parameter Description Required Values Default
xs Size of column on extra small screens. 0 1-12, flex
sm Size of column on small screens. 0 1-12, flex
md Size of column on medium screens. 0 1-12, flex
lg Size of column on large screens. 0 1-12, flex
xl Size of column on extra large screens. 0 1-12, flex
offset_xs Offset on extra small screens. 0 0-12
offset_sm Offset on small screens. 0 0-12
offset_md Offset on medium screens. 0 0-12
offset_lg Offset on large screens. 0 0-12
offset_xl Offset on extra large screens. 0 0-12
pull_xs Pull on extra small screens. 0 0-12
pull_sm Pull on small screens. 0 0-12
pull_md Pull on medium screens. 0 0-12
pull_lg Pull on large screens. 0 0-12
pull_xl Pull on extra large screens. 0 0-12
push_xs Push on extra small screens. 0 0-12
push_sm Push on small screens. 0 0-12
push_md Push on medium screens. 0 0-12
push_lg Push on large screens. 0 0-12
push_xl Push on extra large screens. 0 0-12
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

Media Object


[media]
  [media-object]
    <img src="placeholder-path/placeholder.png">
  [/media-object]
  [media-body]
    [media-heading] <h4>Media Heading</h4> [/media-heading]
    ...
  [/media-body]
[/media]

Wrap several [media-object]s in [media-list], useful for comment threads or articles lists.


[media-list]
  [media]
    [media-object]
      <img src="placeholder-path/placeholder.png">
    [/media-object]
    [media-body]
      [media-heading] <h4>Media Heading</h4> [/media-heading]
      ...
    [/media-body]
  [/media]
  [media]
    [media-object]
      <img src="placeholder-path/placeholder.png">
    [/media-object]
    [media-body]
      [media-heading] <h4>Media Heading</h4> [/media-heading]
      ...
    [/media-body]
  [/media]
[/media-list]

[media] parameters

Parameter Description Required Values Default
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

[media-object] parameters

Parameter Description Required Values Default
media Whether the image pulls to the left or right. 0 left, right left
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

[media-body] parameters

Parameter Description Required Values Default
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

[media-heading] parameters

Note: [media-heading] should contain heading tag (h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, or h6), inserted using the WordPress editor. If a header tag is not added h4 will be inserted automatically.
Parameter Description Required Values Default
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

Responsive Utilities


[hidden down="sm"] ... [/hidden]

[hidden] parameters

Parameter Description Required Values Default
up Hide the contents on this screen size and above. 0 xs, sm, md, lg, xl
down Hide the contents on this screen size and below. 0 xs, sm, md, lg, xl
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

Components

Alerts

Any links, headings, or strong or bold text within an alert will automatically be styled to match the alert type.


[alert type="success"] ... [/alert]

[alert] parameters

Note: Any links, headings, or strong or bold text within an alert will automatically be styled to match the alert type.
Parameter Description Required Values Default
type The type of the alert. 0 success, info, warning, danger success
dismissible If the alert should be dismissable. 0 🚩 (flag)
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

Breadcrumb

Remember that [breadcrumb] must wrap a set of links inserted via the WordPress editor.


[breadcrumb]
  <a href="#link1"> Link 1 </a>
  <a href="#link2"> Link 2 </a>
  [active] Link 3 [/active]
[/breadcrumb]

[breadcrumb] parameters

Parameter Description Required Values Default
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

Buttons

Wrap any a, button, or input tag inserted via the WordPress editor in [button] to give it button properties and classes.

Wrap any a, button, or input tag inserted via the WordPress editor in [button] to give it button properties and classes.


[button type="primary"] <a href="#link">Button Text</a> [/button]

Set button sizes with the size parameter.


[button type="primary" size="lg"] <a href="#link">Button Text</a> [/button]

Set block flag for block-style buttons.


[button type="primary" block] <a href="#link">Button Text</a> [/button]

[button] parameters

Note: Wrap any a, button, or input tag inserted via the WordPress editor in [button] to give it button properties and classes.
Parameter Description Required Values Default
type The type of the button. 0 primary, secondary, success, info, warning, danger, link, outline-primary, outline-secondary, outline-success, outline-info, outline-warning, outline-danger primary
size The size of the button. 0 sm, lg
block Flag whether the button should be a block-level button. 0 🚩 (flag)
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

Button Groups

Remember that [button] must wrap an a, button, or input tag inserted via the WordPress editor.

Remember that [button] must wrap an a, button, or input tag inserted via the WordPress editor.


[button-group]
  [button type="secondary"] [active]<a href="#link">Text</a>[/active] [/button]
  [button type="secondary"] <a href="#link">Text</a> [/button]
  [button type="secondary"] <a href="#link">Text</a> [/button]
[/button-group]

Set the vertical flag to make the buttons appear vertically stacked rather than horiztonally.


[button-group vertical]
  [button type="secondary"] [active]<a href="#link">Text</a>[/active] [/button]
  [button type="secondary"] <a href="#link">Text</a> [/button]
  [button type="secondary"] <a href="#link">Text</a> [/button]
[/button-group]

Wrap [button group]s in [button-toolbar] to make a button toolbar.


[button-toolbar]
  [button-group]
    [button type="secondary"] [active]<a href="#link">Text</a>[/active] [/button]
    [button type="secondary"] <a href="#link">Text</a> [/button]
    [button type="secondary"] <a href="#link">Text</a> [/button]
  [/button-group]
  [button-group]
    [button type="secondary"] <a href="#link">Text</a> [/button]
    [button type="secondary"] <a href="#link">Text</a> [/button]
    [button type="secondary"] <a href="#link">Text</a> [/button]
  [/button-group]
  [button-group]
    [button type="secondary"] [disabled]<a href="#link">Text</a>[/disabled] [/button]
  [/button-group]
[/button-toolbar]

[button-group] parameters

Note: Remember that [button] must wrap an a, button, or input tag inserted via the WordPress editor.
Parameter Description Required Values Default
size The size of the button. 0 sm, lg
vertical Flag whether the button is vertical. 0 🚩 (flag)
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

[button-toolbar] parameters

Note: Remember that [button] must wrap an a, button, or input tag inserted via the WordPress editor.
Parameter Description Required Values Default
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

Cards


[card]
  [card-block]
    [card-title] <h4>Card Title</h4> [/card-title]
    [card-subtitle] <h6>Card Subtitle</h6> [/card-subtitle]
    ...
  [/card-block]
[/card]

Image caps are supported with the [card-img] shortcode and the top or bottom flag.


[card]
  [card-img top]
    <img src="placeholder-path/placeholder-lg.png" class="img-fluid">
  [/card-img]
  [card-block]
    [card-title] <h4>Card Title</h4> [/card-title]
    ...
  [/card-block]
[/card]

Image overlay cards are supported with the [card-img-overlay] shortcode.


[card]
  [card-img]
    <img src="placeholder-path/placeholder-lg.png" class="img-fluid">
  [/card-img]
  [card-img-overlay]
    [card-title] <h4>Card Title</h4> [/card-title]
    ...
  [/card-img-overlay]
[/card]

Card header and card footers are supported with the [card-header] and [card-footer] shortcodes.


[card]
  [card-header] ... [/card-header]
  [card-block]
    [card-title] <h4>Card Title</h4> [/card-title]
    ...
  [/card-block]
  [card-footer] ... [/card-footer]
[/card]

[card] parameters

Parameter Description Required Values Default
type Contextual background color for the card. 0 primary, secondary, success, info, warning, danger, link, outline-primary, outline-secondary, outline-success, outline-info, outline-warning, outline-danger primary
inverse Flag whether to invert the text color for contextual backgrounds. 0 🚩 (flag)
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

[card-block] parameters

Note: Any p or blockquote tags within [card-block] will automatically receive card-text or card-blockquote classes respectively
Parameter Description Required Values Default
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

[card-title] parameters

Note: [card-title] should contain a heading tag (h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, or h6), inserted using the WordPress editor. If a heading tag is not added h4 will be inserted automatically
Parameter Description Required Values Default
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

[card-subtitle] parameters

Note: [card-subtitle] should contain a heading tag (h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, or h6), inserted using the WordPress editor. If a heading tag is not added h6 will be inserted automatically
Parameter Description Required Values Default
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

[card-img] parameters

Note: [card-img] should contain an image inserted using the WordPress editor.
Parameter Description Required Values Default
top Flag whether this image cap is at the top of the card. 0 🚩 (flag)
bottom Flag whether this image cap is at the bottom of the card. 0 🚩 (flag)
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

[card-img-overlay] parameters

Parameter Description Required Values Default
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

[card-header] parameters

Note: [card-header] should contain a heading tag (h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, or h6), inserted using the WordPress editor. If a heading tag is not added div (no heading) will be inserted automatically
Parameter Description Required Values Default
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text

[card-footer] parameters

Parameter Description Required Values Default
class Any extra classes you want to add. optional any text
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text
